lead_paragraph: Go Deputy raced three wide on the turn and took the lead to win the $500,000 Sword Dancer Invitational by two lengths over Silver Whistle yesterday at Saratoga Race Course.
snippet: Go Deputy raced three wide on the turn and took the lead to win the $500,000 Sword Dancer Invitational by two lengths over Silver Whistle yesterday at Saratoga Race Course.
